Description:
The Loan Processing Team supports the JPMorgan Private Banking Mortgage Origination business. The team is responsible for processing of mortgages along with simultaneous HELOCs. During this process, the file will exit from the Prelim team and be appropriately assigned out to Processor. The Processor will then complete the entire process; inclusive of engagement with the Underwriting, Rate Lock, Closing, Quality and Mortgage Advisory teams as necessary. The goal is to ensure the complete financial package is received; the underwriting decision has been made; handle any appropriate inter-process changes from the Client or MA; obtain all required third party and vendor information; obtain a clear to close from quality and remediate all QC findings; and ultimately submit to closing according to Federal and State regulatory requirements. Processing Specialist will be responsible to communicate with multiple internal and external groups to resolve any issues that may arise. The role is not client facing, although communication to 3rd parties can occur while clients are signing and messages are relayed.Job Responsibilities:Achieve daily production targets on a consistent basis and turnaround priority reviews within the stipulated timelines
Maintain high standards and follow all process controls with no lapses
Handle issues and escalate to management if required
Interact with different stakeholder to resolve process issues and play key role in adding process controls
Suggest process enhancements, possible automations for better controls, perform periodic risk and controls analysis with the team for process risk valuation
Proficient in organizing, priority setting, and pipeline managementRequired Qualifications, skills and capabilities:At least Bachelor’s degree 
Willing to work in North America schedules
Experience in Loan Processing process is preferred
2+ years of experience in US mortgage loan originations 
Experience in Loan Processing process is preferred
Excellent written and verbal communication skills to communicate with internal and external parties to resolve issues
Expertise in Mortgage concepts; Working knowledge of major US Mortgage Regulations
Detailed understanding of all stages of mortgage originations life cycle
Proficiency in analyzing documents like Title, Home Owners Insurance/Flood, Appraisal, etc.
Must have had exposure to production management, work allocation, prioritization, exception handling, and process documentation
